Headline: Howard-bound Yellow Line Delays
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Yellow Line trains are running with delays at Skokie. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Yellow Line trains are running with delays at Skokie.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Personnel are working to restore normal service.

Allow extra travel time.
